frontmatter.title: Discover and execute end-to-end workflows 300-level live demo
frontmatter.description: Discover and execute end-to-end workflows 300-level live demo

internal.content:
--- title: Discover and execute end-to-end workflows 300-level live demo description: Discover and execute end-to-end workflows 300-level live demo tabs: [ 'Demo preparation', 'Demo script'] --- export const Title = () => ( Discover and execute end-to-end workflows
300-level live demo ); | DEMO OVERVIEW | | | :--- | :--- | | **Scenario overview** | This demo shows how IBM’s process mining capabilities are used to discover and analyze business processes and identify areas for improvement. A customer account closing example is used to showcase how process mining helps an organization meet regulatory requirements while also reducing process execution cost. | | **Demo products** | Cloud Pak for Business Automation | | **Demo capabilities** | Process mining | | **Demo script** | A complete demo script is on the second tab above.

This demo script has multiple tasks, that each have multiple steps. In each step, you have the details about what you need to do (**Actions**), what you can say while delivering this demo step (**Narration**), and what diagrams and screenshots you will see.

This demo script is a suggestion, and you are welcome to customize based on your sales opportunity. Most importantly, practice this demo in advance. If the demo seems easy for you to execute, the customer will focus on the content. If it seems difficult for you to execute, the customer will focus on your delivery. | | **Required versions** | | | **How to get support** | Contact #itz-techzone-support or techzone.help@ibm.com regarding issues with reserving and provisioning TechZone environments.

Contact #platinumdemos-automation-support regarding issues with setting up and running this demo use case. | ## **INSTALL THE DEMO**
1 - Technology Zone demo environment
Reserve a Technology Zone demo environment here.
NOTE: The Technology Zone provided environment contains three virtual machines. Only the IBM Process Mining Server is used for this demo.
**[Go to top](#top)**
2 - Process Mining Server
1. Access your Technology Zone environment using the link in the reservation email. You may also use the IBM Technology Zone’s **My Library** → **My Reservations** page.
2. If the VMs are not already started, click the **Play** icon to start the **IBM Process Mining Server** virtual machine (VM).
3. Click to open the **IBM Process Mining Server** VM.


4. Press the **ESC** key on your keyboard.
5. Click **Not listed?**


6. Enter '**root**' under **Username**, and click **Next**.


7. Enter '**IBMDem0s!**' under **Password**, and click **Sign In**.


8. Click **Activities**.


9. Click **Terminal**.


10. Enter '**cd/opt/processmining/bin**' in the Terminal window.
11. Enter '**./start.sh**' in the Terminal window.
12. Enter '**service nginx start**' when the prompt returns.

You should see the following output:

13. Wait for several minutes for the Process Mining server to start.
**[Go to top](#top)**
## **PREPARE TO GIVE THE DEMO**
1 - Open the IBM Process Mining workspace
1. Click **Activities**.


2. Click **Firefox**.


3. Click **IBM Process Mining | Sign in** on the bookmark toolbar.


4. Enter '**maintenance.admin**' for the **UserID** and '**IBMDem0s!**' for the **Password**, and click **Sign in**.


5. From the **Process mining** workspace, click **Account Closure**.


6. The **Account Closure** model is now open. Click the **Datasource** tab.


7. The **Datasource** tab is now open.


**[Go to top](#top)**
*** Click [here](/300-business-automation-discover-and-execute-end-to-end-workflows/demo-script) to go to the **Demo script** on the next tab.
